channel.title: Rune-honor/Rune-Sanctum 317 Double XP / PK Point Weekends
channel.description:
[center]Welcome and thank you for viewing my thread we hope you are willing to stay with our server and continue to support us if you do!
New just Released server [url=http://www.Rune-Sanctum.com]Rune-Sanctum | #1 Growings RSPS[/url]
Oldschool Still in beta server! [url=http://www.rune-honor.com]Rune-Honor | #1 Growings RSPS[/url]
Core re-work for great server stability Friendly and active community Duo Slayer Dwarf multi cannon In game PvP highscores Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding Flawless combat system Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits All skills fully working and being worked on every day Daily server and website updates A hard working owner who listens to his players Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items! Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime Great combat rates so you may enjoy the server for as long as possible without losing interest fast! Max cape for players who accomplish all 99's Highscores and auto donations And many, many more features join today to see them for your self! Multi world management system!
[URL=http://rune-sanctum.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZXVyzVj.png[/img][/URL]
Why should you choose to play Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor over other servers?
A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor on the update-log on the forums. Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Rune-Sanctum/Rune-Honor is the place for you.
Both of our servers are ran by Highly trained staff teams who do their best to make your enjoyment and your stay on the server we try our best to add daily game content to also make the server more competitive as well as weekly events where my staff team will fluoridate so we can all have decent fun!
We put time into FUN and ENJOYMENT! All the videos posted below even though they say rune-honor they are rune-sanctum!
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q73kwVuw2uw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q73kwVuw2uw[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7pYfeaqa8o]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7pYfeaqa8o[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oKi-34eS_OE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oKi-34eS_OE[/url]
[URL=http://rune-honor.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/w1cxLUT.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://rune-honor.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jZ4ZCElIy5t4R.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://rune-honor.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jPmp6Iq04hzVl.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://rune-honor.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jKpBdgPGlDoLB.png[/img][/URL][/center]

item.description:
@runehonor wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

if a server is based of notorious you better fix that drop dupe

The drop dupe is fixed First thing I investigated Btw love what you do when your bored and love your work :3

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-honor/Rune-Sanctum 317 Double XP / PK Point Weekends
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

For as ugly as this advertisement thread is, I can guarantee both servers are great. One being based off notorious while the other arios, they both have great potential. I will be allocating most of my time working with Rune Sanctum (ironic how its named off my old server from three years ago), but I will also be helping out on Rune Honor when I have the time to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune-honor/Rune-Sanctum 317 Double XP / PK Point Weekends
